problems.title: Subarrays with Sum Divisible by K
problems.description:
You are given an array of N integers and an integer K.
A subarray is a contiguous part of the array. The sum of a subarray may be positive, negative, or zero.
Your task is to count how many subarrays have a sum that is divisible by K.

Input Format:
The first line contains two integers N and K.
The second line contains N space-separated integers a1, a2, ..., aN.

Output Format:
Print a single integer, the number of subarrays whose sum is divisible by K.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5 5
1 2 3 4 5

Sample Output
4

Explanation:
Subarrays with sum divisible by 5 are: [2,3], [5], [1,2,3,4,5], and [3,4,5].
hintsList: Use prefix sums: if two prefix sums have the same remainder when divided by K, then the subarray between them has sum divisible by K. Count frequencies of each remainder.
